# Periapt of the Draaki Savage
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Rare
#Special-Item-Rarity/Rare

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
While a [[Draaki|draaki]] wears a *periapt of the [[Draaki Savage|draaki savage]]*, he is considered to be constantly under the effects of a *[[Draaki Savage|draaki savage]]* spell.
